headline: Ameren Missouri files plan with Missouri Public Service Commission to help spur economic growth in the state
summary: Ameren Missouri, a subsidiary of Ameren Corporation (NYSE: AEE), has filed a plan with the Missouri Public Service Commission (PSC) to accommodate the growing energy demands of large, energy-intensive customers. The company's Powering Missouri Growth Plan aims to ensure that Ameren Missouri can reliably serve these new customers, including advanced manufacturing and data centers, while maintaining just and reasonable rates for all customers.
